metadata.title: Loan Beyond Credit Limit - Extra Funds Access | Emirates NBD

content:
What are people asking?
What is the Loan on Card beyond credit limit facility?
Loan on Card beyond credit limit is an installment plan that allows you to access additional cash beyond your available Credit Card limit. The loan amount can be transferred to your bank account or issued as a manager’s cheque.
Who can apply for a Loan on Card beyond credit limit?
All primary Emirates NBD Credit Cardholders can apply for a Loan on Card beyond credit limit, based on card usage and performance.
What is the maximum amount I can borrow as Loan on Card beyond credit limit?
You can borrow up to 100% of your credit card limit. The amount will vary based on your eligibility and is subject to approval.
Can I cancel my existing Loan on Card beyond credit limit plan on my Credit Card, and will I be charged?
You can prepay or foreclose your loan by contacting our call center at
600 54 0000
. A foreclosure fee of 1% of the principal outstanding plus 5% VAT will apply.

How long does it take to process a Loan on Card beyond credit limit?
Your request will be processed within 2-3 working days.
Can supplementary cardholders apply for a Loan on Card beyond credit limit?
No, only primary cardholders can apply.
Are there any charges for a Loan on Card beyond credit limit?
Any applicable fees on the Loan on Card beyond  credit limit facility is determined by Emirates NBD and will be charged on the  plan.
Fees are subject to changes on periodic  basis. Please

Will I be eligible for reward points with a Loan on Card beyond credit limit?
No, currently, there are no reward points associated with a Loan on Card beyond credit limit.

No, currently, there are no reward points associated with a Loan on Card beyond credit limit.
Once I avail the Loan on Card beyond credit limit program, will my available balance increase corresponding to transaction amount placed in installments?
The Loan on Card beyond credit limit amount is over and above your credit limit, so your credit limit will not be affected by the loan amount.
How is the monthly EMI calculated for a Loan on Card beyond credit limit?
The EMI will be calculated based on the loan principal, interest for the selected tenure, and any applicable processing fees. The first EMI will include processing fee if applicable.
